data.title: TEA: Thermal Equilibrium Abundances
data.name: TEA
data.description: Thermochemical Equilibrium Abundances (TEA), a code to calculate gaseous molecular abundances under thermochemical equilibrium conditions

evidence: "TEA - calculates Thermochemical Equilibrium Abundances of chemical species" (describes a domain-specific scientific calculation tool, i.e., an application users run).

"The Start Guide with basic instructions on how to install and run TEA is: doc/start_guide.txt" (indicates users run the program directly, consistent with application software and direct research execution).
"Visit our Github site: https://github.com/dzesmin/TEA/" (points to GitHub as the primary distribution channel, i.e., source repository).
